price: a mi smo mislili da ni ljudi ni džini o Allahu laži ne govore;
arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan taqūla al-insu wal-jinu ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban
